alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 25 at 3:34PM EDT until March 27 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SATURDAY TO 1 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Higher Elevations of Fayette and Higher Elevations of Westmoreland Counties. In West Virginia, Eastern Preston, Eastern Tucker and Western Tucker Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM Saturday to 1 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Western Tucker
